Flow.description: Notify HR for US Employee Leave Details When the Employee Apply for Leave and Employees Concern Manager Approves or Rejects the Leave records.
Flow.interviewLabel: Notify HR for US Employee Leave Details {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Notify HR for US Employee Leave Details

textTemplates.name: BodyLeaveRejected
textTemplates.text:
Dear HR Team,

This is to notify you that {!$Record.EMS_LM_Contact__r.FirstName}- {!$Record.EMS_LM_Contact__r.EMS_RM_Employee_Id__c} {!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_Type_Name__c} request has been rejected by {!$Record.EMS_LM_Current_Approver__c


Leave Start Date

Leave End Date

Status

Day

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_Start_Date__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Leave_End_Date__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Status__c}

{!$Record.EMS_LM_Day__c}


Comments: {!$Record.EMS_LM_Reason__c}


Regards,

The Cloud Peritus Team
